name: Blood Mage vs MajiZombis
description:
Play as a young blood mage, as you try to leave you're house and make it to the safe area.

For the theme, I made it so that with in the gameplay, you have 1 resource (your stamina) and your skill and dash eat it up. But if it reaches zero you die.

On top of that you can only get healed at a safe zone, and that is also where you can save, and get change your passive skill that goes with your main skill bolt. There are 6 passives and you can use only 1 of them to your advantage. Your skill bolt, is your only skill you can use. The zombies will deplete your stamina, as well as using bolt.
